name: Totally Ethical Testing Area
description:
Players are required to complete challenges by killing all the test subjects with the given tools. Mechanics:

Zombie: Will chase people to the end of the arena and will scare people by 1 block when passing by.

Mine: When triggered mines will kill everyone inside 1 block radius and will scare humans inside 2 block radius by 1 block.

Spike: Kills everyone that touches it and will scare nearby humans if someone is killed by 1 block.

Level Walkthroughs Available Here: 

https://gfycat.com/@themightypleb/collections/UnuX8eB7/teta-level-walkthroughs

Keep in mind there are multiple ways to complete some levels.
